paper_abstract: We propose a temporal logic, TECTLF, for the flexible specification of distributed real-time systems with constraints involving events, propositions, and fairness. We then present algorithms formodel-checking TECTLF formulas and a speed-up technique for refuting certain formulas. Finally, we report the implementation and experiment of the ideas in our tool, RED 8.
paper_title: Model-checking fair dense-time systems with propositions and events
